message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession but a testament to its craftsmanship and history. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a new owner who will appreciate and cherish it as much as I have. Considering its rarity and quality, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950000. I trust that this offer reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity to make it yours. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
